title: CISA Catalog of Known Exploited Vulnerabilities

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Accellion FTA OS Command Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a crafted POST request to various admin endpoints.

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Accellion FTA OS Command Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a local web service call.
